meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jack Barry Heather Heffner Molly Lalonde Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6856.

td.p: Jack Barry, a chief financial officer from Raleigh, North Carolina
Heather Heffner, an attorney from St. Louis, Missouri
Molly Lalonde, a pediatric nurse practitioner student from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,600)

tr.td: AMERICAN CITIES
YOU CAN QUOTE ME
SPORTS TALK
STUPID ANSWERS
STOP! HEY, WHAT'S THAT SOUND?
EVERYBODY LOOK WHAT'S GOING "DOWN"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Heather: What is Pittsburgh?)

Philadelphia

MollyHeather
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
